titleStmt.title: Anti-Fimbria, or, An answer to the animadversions upon the last speeches of the [f]ive Jesuits executed at Tyburne June 20. 30. 1679. / By A.C.E.G.
titleStmt.author: Warner, John, 1628-1692.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with loss of print on cover and in text.
Reproduction of original in: Exeter College Library, Oxford, England.
